alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 11:09AM PST until December 31 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow will continue through the morning before starting to diminish this afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches in the Spring Mountains, Sheep Range, and the mountains of southeast Lincoln County. 5 to 10 inches for northern Mohave County plateaus and mountains. * WHERE...In Nevada, Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon, Sheep Range and Lincoln County. In Arizona, Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially on Highway 160 across Mountain Spring Summit. Also, Highway 156, 157 and 158 into Kyle and Lee Canyons. All highways throughout Lincoln County and Highway 389 and Mount Trumbull Loop in northern Mohave County.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
